name: Bill Nguyen
body:
### Skills
***

* Eager and fast learner
* Works well in a team environment and has past experience working with others
* Also works well independently 
* Time management (Arrive to work on time and get tasks done as quickly and thoroughly as possible)
* Able to talk to and serve customers  


### Work Experience
***

**Let's Go Pal** - _AUGUST, 2015 - NOVEMBER, 2015_

* Owner and Editor-In-Chief. Wrote 14 articles, averaging over 800 page views each.

**McDispenser.com** - _MARCH, 2015 - JUNE, 2015_

* Managed day-to-day operations, and made sure everything was running smoothly.
* Head support agent, answered customer emails/live chat requests and ensured customers were satisfied with the quality of our service.

### VOLUNTEER WORK
***

* Homework Club (Godson Elementary School)
* Fraser Valley Gleaners

### EDUCATION
***

Abbotsford Senior Secondary - _10th grade_ | **SEPTEMBER 2015 - PRESENT**


### AWARDS
***

* 3rd place winner at the LNG Gearbots Competition (Youth Expo 2015) - **October 14th, 2015**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
